meanings.definition: A Mediterranean shrub with white or pink flowers.
meanings.sent1: The cistus in our garden bloomed beautifully this spring.
meanings.sent2: The cistus bushes along the path added a lovely touch of color.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the cistus, enjoying its sweet nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a cistus in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the cistus danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the rockrose family.
meanings.sent1: The cistus genus includes many different species of beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the various species within the cistus genus.
meanings.sent3: The gardeners joked that the cistus plants were having a family reunion.
meanings.sent4: The cistus genus stood out like a colorful painting in the garden.
meanings.sent5: Each cistus plant in the genus had its own unique charm.

meanings.definition: A resin obtained from certain species of cistus plants.
meanings.sent1: The cistus resin was used in ancient times for its healing properties.
meanings.sent2: The scent of cistus filled the air as the resin was collected.
meanings.sent3: The villagers traded the precious cistus resin for other goods.
meanings.sent4: The cistus resin glowed like amber in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The cistus resin was treasured for its rare and powerful effects.
